Name: The Dragon's Prophecy
About the game: PRESENTATION The Dragon's Prophecy is an old-school 2D RPG in the style of the early Final Fantasy and Dragon Quest. FEATURES The Dragon's Prophecy is inspired by the greatest of it's genre. Taking reference from the 8 bit era, it brings back nostalgic times while absorbing the lessons that made the JRPG genre what it is today It's classic visuals are accompanied of an incredible soundtrack that brings this great adventure to life The world of The Dragon's Prophecy is versatile and it will allow you to explore forests, caves, towers, villages, towns, castles, deserts and more While you explore, you may come upon optional dungeons, bosses and special items The Dragon's Prophecy offers a semi-open world experience. You are free to explore on your own schedule SUMMARY Magnus is the heir to the throne, shadowed by his father's great figure, he decides to do the right thing when he receives a calling from the Elves, the original race. The Dragon of Chaos has been freed, and Magnus is one of the individuals capable of keeping the Dragon from devouring the whole world. On his quest he will learn about the world he is meant to rule, he will learn about his companions and he will learn about himself. To fight and defeat the Dragon of Chaos, he must become the man and king he was always meant to be and never was. The road is long and perilous, and a Dragon waits at every corner. MORE GAMES / / /
